content: pin pennant display your ever-growing enamel pin collection on this knitted wall hanging work from the bottom up before knitting the last row onto a dowel or stick then hang on the wall to show off the pins that make you smile most particulars instructions finished size co 39 sts using the long tail cast on method 10 25 cm tall 7 17 cm wide set up k19 pm k1 pm k to 1 sts before end sl1wyif yarn row 1 rs k to 1 st before end slipping markers as you work sl1wyif 70 yards worsted weight yarn row 2 ws k to 1 st before end slipping markers as you work sl1wyif sample shown in manos del repeat row 1-2 1 more time uruguay maxima worsted weight 100% merino wool 219 yards/100 g in sand row 5 k3 m1l k to 2 sts before m ssk sm sl1wyib sm k2tog k to last 3 sts m1r k2 sl1wyif gauge 12 sts = 4 in stockinette sts row 6 k3 p to last 3 sts slipping markers as you work k2 sl1wyif worked flat repeat row 5-6 4 more times needles us 8 5 mm row 15 repeat row 5 materials row 16 k to m sm p1 sm k to last st sl1wyif row 17 repeat row 5 + 2 stitch markers + 1/4 dowel approx 10 5 long row 18 repeat row 6 + tassel maker optional repeat row 17-18 1 more time + needle for fringe optional repeat row 15-20 1 one more time co cast on row 41 k2 kfb p to 2 sts before m p2tog sl1wyib sm p2tog p to 3 sts before k knit end m1p k2 sl1wyif k2tog knit 2 together row 42 k to m sm p1 sm k to last st sl1wyif kfb knit front and back repeat row 41-42 6 more times m marker m1l make 1 left m1r make 1 right row 55 repeat row 5 m1p make 1 purlwise row 56 repeat row 6 p purl pm place marker repeat row 55-56 1 more time rs right side sl1wyib slip 1 sts with yarn held row 59 k3 k to last st removing m as you work sl1wyif in back sl1wyif slip 1 with yarn held in row 60 k1 k2tog to last st k1 front sm slip marker loosely knit all stitches onto a dowel or thin stick secure end and cut yarn ssk slip slip knit add tassel or fringe to your heart s desire st s stitch es ws wrong side billy a n d b aa billyandbaa com @billyandbaa #billyandbaa pattern no 004 l pin pennant
